e_subtitle: This will introduce the activity. Sed quis augue condimentum tellus mentum pellentesque consectetur adipiscing elit in est ipsum dolor sit amet.
e_list:
1. Read the example on the screen.

  2. Drag it to the scope level to which you think it belongs.

  3. If you drag it incorrectly, the example will go back in rotation and you'll see it again.

  4. The feedback will guide you to make the right choices.
